snippet.title: Perfect Universe - Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
From Wills Sykes Games and Excalibur, Perfect Universe is a must-have collection of mini-games that span a range of genres including platforming, racing, volleyball and football set in a monochrome 2.5D moon-like environment.
Each level of the game has a varying strength of gravitational pull which makes for some awesome crazy physics. It’s easy to learn but hard to master due to these random gravity factors. The unpredictable force of the gravity means that if you time it just right, for example in one game, you can glide from planet to planet.  It is both frustrating and addictive to play.  

There are nine game modes – 3 single player and 6 local multiplayer.  The multi-player mode includes diverse and entertaining mini-games to play – something I love! It’s hilarious watching your friend’s reactions in person when you whoop them. 
  
© 2016. Excalibur Publishing Limited.  Will Sykes Games.  All rights reserved
